unidade: Faculdade de Economia, Administração e Contabilidade de Ribeirão Preto
objetivos:
1)	Introduce students to the basics of International Law, underlining the difference between Private and Public International Law.
2)	Guide students to think on International Law, differentiating it from other similar areas, like International Politics and International Relations.
programa_resumido:
Introduction to International Law (public and private)
International Treaties
International x Domestic Law
Subjects of Public International Law
Human Rights

turmas.observacoes: Limite de 30 vagas. Oferecimento em Inglês.
